author: mfreedman
msg: Fixed issues with URL encoding tests:  i.e. use url encoder based on latest rfc AND made sure that all URL compares took into account that the portlet container can return XML & in their results.
Also modified BridgeDestroyTestPortlet to provider better information that it can only be run once per app instance.

author: kmarsden
msg: DERBY-4664 Change Derby internal stored procedures to avoid DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:default:connection") as it may be recognized by other Drivers
This fix is really a work around for  DERBY-4668 for internal procedures.

author: mfreedman
msg: Fixed issues with URL encoding tests:  i.e. use url encoder based on latest rfc AND made sure that all URL compares took into account that the portlet container can return XML & in their results.

author: dblevins
msg: Fix from Matthew B. Jones, OPENEJB-1282: mappedName fails to work for @Singleton

author: lu4242
msg: MYFACES-2728 StateManagementStrategy should lookup ViewDeclarationLanguage on restoreView (does not assume possible wrapping)
